2 Input fields

2.1 Fields

Basic styling. Base class is .sr-input

Markup

<input type="text" placeholder="[modifier class]" class="sr-input [modifier class]" />
<input type="text" value="[modifier class]" class="sr-input [modifier class]" />
<input type="password" placeholder="[modifier class]" value="[modifier class]" class="sr-input [modifier class]" />
<textarea class="sr-input [modifier class]">Hello world</textarea>
.sr-input--disabled
Disabled field. If you use <input />, disabled attribute works as well.
Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
